rooms.description: The entrance hall is designed to welcome guests with a spacious area leading into the house. It is placed at the south-east corner for positive Vastu energy and incorporates natural lighting through windows.
The master bedroom is located in the north-west quadrant to promote peaceful energy. It includes a private balcony overlooking the garden and has ample natural light.
This bedroom is designed for the children, located in the north-west area to ensure calm and positive vibes. It features large windows for ventilation.
Additional bedroom placed strategically towards the east to encourage a harmonious environment, with views of the garden.
The kitchen is located in the northeast sector for prosperity and culinary success according to Vastu principles. It features an open plan design with access to a dining area.
The living room is central for family gatherings and has Mediterranean-style decor elements such as terracotta tiles and stone accents. It includes a window facing east to welcome the morning light.
Adjacent to the kitchen, this area is designed for family meals and casual gatherings with Mediterranean aesthetics that emphasize natural materials and warm colors.
The home theater is situated towards the west end of the house to minimize distractions and ensure privacy. It features soundproofing elements in line with modern design trends.
This multipurpose room is positioned near the living room for easy access while maintaining a quiet environment, ideal for work or study.

openings.description: The main entrance is designed to align with Vastu principles by being on the south or east side, ensuring a positive flow of energy.
The garage entrance leads to a two-car garage which is conveniently located on the periphery of the property.
Windows are strategically placed to enhance natural lighting and ventilation throughout all rooms, keeping in mind Vastu guidelines.

openings.opening_type: Doorway between Kitchen and Dining Area
openings.description: This doorway facilitates smooth movement between the kitchen and dining area, enhancing functionality.

notes.vastu_compliance: The layout has been designed in accordance with Vastu principles by positioning key rooms (entrance, master bedroom) in appropriate cardinal directions to promote positive energy flow.
notes.mediterranean_style: Mediterranean design elements are integrated throughout the house including terracotta tiles, natural stone accents, and warm color palettes to achieve a classic Mediterranean aesthetic.
notes.garage_and_garden: A two-car garage is included on the periphery of the property with ample garden space surrounding the house for relaxation and outdoor activities.
